scenarios.title: Q1 Product Launch Readiness Review
scenarios.context:
The team is preparing for a major product launch scheduled for February 1, 2025. 
This meeting is to review all readiness items, identify blockers, and finalize the launch checklist.
Engineering has completed 90% of features, but there are concerns about QA timeline.
dependencies: Engineering sign-off required before QA final approval
Design assets must be finalized before marketing materials
Legal review pending on Terms of Service updates
scenarios.user_prompt: Help me create a workback plan for the upcoming meeting 'Q1 Product Launch Readiness Review'

dependencies: Engineering sign-off required before QA final approval
Design assets must be finalized before marketing materials
Legal review pending on Terms of Service updates

scenarios.title: Budget Planning FY26 Kickoff
scenarios.context:
Annual budget planning kickoff for FY26. Finance team needs to consolidate 
departmental requests, review historical spending, and align with strategic priorities.
CFO has requested 5% overall cost reduction target.
dependencies: Department heads must submit requests before consolidation
Strategic priorities document from CEO required
HR headcount projections needed for salary planning
scenarios.user_prompt: Create a workback plan to prepare for the FY26 Budget Planning Kickoff meeting

dependencies: Department heads must submit requests before consolidation
Strategic priorities document from CEO required
HR headcount projections needed for salary planning

scenarios.title: Customer Escalation Review - Acme Corp
scenarios.context:
Critical customer escalation from Acme Corp regarding service outages. 
Customer is threatening contract termination unless issues are resolved.
Three major incidents in the past month need root cause analysis.
dependencies: Engineering post-mortem reports due before meeting
Account manager to provide customer sentiment update
Legal to review SLA breach implications
scenarios.user_prompt: Help me prepare a workback plan for the Acme Corp escalation review meeting

dependencies: Engineering post-mortem reports due before meeting
Account manager to provide customer sentiment update
Legal to review SLA breach implications
